SEARCH
Package domain

Class FileInfoController

java.lang.Object
domain.FileInfoController
public class FileInfoController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing FileInfo entities. Provides operations to retrieve, save, delete, and update file information related to maintenance records.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getFileInfoDao

      protected GenericDao<FileInfo> getFileInfoDao()
      Returns the DAO used for FileInfo database operations.
      Returns:
      the fileInfo DAO instance

    • getFilesForMaintenance

      public List<FileInfo> getFilesForMaintenance(int maintenanceId)
      Retrieves a list of all files associated with a specific maintenance ID.
      Parameters:
      maintenanceId - the ID of the maintenance record
      Returns:
      list of FileInfo linked to the specified maintenance

    • saveFile

      public void saveFile(FileInfo fileInfo)
      Saves a new file record to the database. Starts and commits a transaction around the insert operation.
      Parameters:
      fileInfo - the FileInfo entity to save

    • deleteFile

      public void deleteFile(FileInfo fileInfo)
      Deletes a file record from the database. Starts and commits a transaction around the delete operation.
      Parameters:
      fileInfo - the FileInfo entity to delete

    • getFileContent

      public byte[] getFileContent(FileInfo fileInfo)
      Retrieves the binary content of a given file.
      Parameters:
      fileInfo - the file entity
      Returns:
      the content as a byte array

    • saveFileContent

      public void saveFileContent(File file, FileInfo fileInfo) throws IOException
      Reads file content from the given File and saves it into the provided FileInfo entity, then persists the entity. Updates the file size and upload timestamp.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to read content from
      fileInfo - the file entity to update and save
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs reading the file

    • saveFileContent

      public void saveFileContent(byte[] content, FileInfo fileInfo)
      Saves the provided byte array content into the FileInfo entity and persists it. Updates the file size and upload timestamp.
      Parameters:
      content - the file content as a byte array
      fileInfo - the file entity to update and save
